metadata.title: CVE-2018-16369 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: XRef::fetch in XRef.cc in Xpdf 4.00 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (stack consumption) via a crafted pdf file, related toAcroForm::scanField, as demonstrated by pdftohtml. NOTE: this might overlapCVE-2018-7453.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
